Conservative.name: Conservative
Conservative.description: Lower fees for competitive positioning and repeat borrowers
Conservative.typical_use: Repeat borrowers, large deals, competitive situations

Market.name: Market Standard
Market.description: Standard market pricing for typical deals
Market.typical_use: Standard deals, moderate leverage, good credit

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: Premium pricing for higher-risk or complex deals
Aggressive.typical_use: Turnaround situations, new operators, high LTV

Acquisition.name: Acquisition Financing
Acquisition.description: Structured for acquisition financing with higher fees
